SELECT a.*, b.ProductName, i.ListName AS TypeTxt, c.ListName as ProductCategoryTxt, d.ListName as FlavourTxt, e.ListName as PackageSpecificationTxt, f.ListName as PackageUnitTxt, g.ListName as SpecificationTxt, h.ListName as UnitTxt FROM StorageProduct a LEFT JOIN productinfo b ON a.ProductCode = b.ProductCode JOIN baselistitem c ON b.ProductCategory=c.ListID JOIN baselistitem d ON b.Flavour=d.ListID JOIN baselistitem e ON b.PackageSpecification =e.ListID JOIN baselistitem f ON b.PackageUnit =f.ListID JOIN baselistitem g ON b.Specification=g.ListID JOIN baselistitem h ON b.Unit=h.ListID JOIN baselistitem i ON a.Type=i.ListValue
AND a.productCode=#{productCode}
